articles.description: Arsenal are close to a deal for Sporting striker Viktor Gyokeres after negotiations over the finer details of the transfer took longer than expected.

articles.description: Teenage forward Findlay Curtis repays new head coach Russell Martin's show of faith with a key role in Rangers' crucial first-leg win over Panathinaikos in Champions League qualifying.
articles.title: 'Cool cat' Findlay Curtis ignites Russell Martin's Rangers reign

articles.description: England defender Jess Carter says she could not have had the confidence to play in England's 2-1 defeat of Italy in their Euro 2025 semi-final after being racially abused were it not for the support of fans.
articles.title: Jess Carter: England defender grateful for 'incredible love' to play in Euro 2025 semi-final win

articles.description: With the second Test looming large in Melbourne, head coach Andy Farrell has some food for thought as he prepares to name his matchday squad on Thursday.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Andy Farrell considers squad for second Test v Australia

articles.description: Daniel Dubois' team will hold an "internal inquest" after a video surfaced showing a reported house "gathering" hours before his defeat to Oleksandr Usyk.
articles.title: Usyk vs Dubois 2: Briton's team to hold 'inquest' after reported gathering before he lost
